name: demo-ffi-bun-rust
description: FFI demo application: Bun, Rust, and C# interoperability

scripts.build:all: bun run build:rust && bun run build:csharp
scripts.demo:bun-rust: bun run build:rust && bun run dev
scripts.demo:bun-csharp: bun run build:csharp && bun run dev:csharp
scripts.demo:csharp-rust: bun run build:rust && bun run run:dotnet
scripts.demo:combined: bun run build:all && bun run dev:combined
scripts.demo:all:
bun run demo:bun-rust && echo '
---
' && bun run demo:bun-csharp && echo '
---
' && bun run demo:csharp-rust && echo '
---
' && bun run demo:combined
scripts.start: bun run build:rust && bun run dev
